holidays.title: National Kitten Day
holidays.description: Who doesn't love tiny, adorable kittens?

holidays.title: National Piña Colada Day
holidays.description: A frosty and delightfully creamy concoction of pineapple, rum, and coconut cream.

holidays.title: Bahamas Independence Day
holidays.description: Get ready for some historical facts and cultural insights about this amazing nation.

holidays.title: Don't Step On A Bee Day
holidays.description: It’s time to “bee” more aware of this buzzing insect’s importance in our ecosystem.

holidays.title: Feast of St. Rosalia
holidays.description: Keep reading to learn about Rosalia Sinibaldi’s life and how she became a saint.

holidays.title: Global Energy Independence Day
holidays.description: We explore energy consumption, current fuel types, and prospects this Global Energy Independence Day.

holidays.title: Gospel Day
holidays.description: Join hands with the rest of the Christian community and commemorate this special day.

holidays.title: International Town Criers Day
holidays.description: If you think opera singers have the most powerful lungs, these guys may come a close second.

holidays.title: National Caleb Day
holidays.description: High fives to everyone named Caleb! Today, we celebrate you on National Caleb Day.

holidays.title: National Clerihew Day
holidays.description: Treat yourself to some serious giggles by reading some funny clerihews on National Clerihew Day.

holidays.title: National Pizza Day in Brazil
holidays.description: Get a slice of pizza, admire the beauty of the cheese melt, and dig in.

holidays.title: National Stella Day
holidays.description: Are you named Stella or know someone with the name? Today is all about you!

holidays.title: National Transplant Financial Coordinator Day
holidays.description: National Transplant Financial Coordinator Day educates about the staff, procedures, and financial processes of organ transplants.

holidays.title: National Wyoming Day
holidays.description: Celebrate a significant state in the history of the U.S. — the Equality State.

holidays.title: Pick Blueberries Day
holidays.description: We are ‘berry’ excited to celebrate this delicious superfood and get picking!

holidays.title: Political Flag Day
holidays.description: The design of the Mongolian flag represents its journey to independence through the years.

holidays.title: Teddy Bear Picnic Day
holidays.description: Bask on a blanket in the glorious outdoors with your or your kids’ best stuffed pals.

holidays.title: Karma Fizz’s Birthday
holidays.description: This adorable YouTube star has made a name for herself and her popularity continues to grow.

holidays.title: Kulture Kiari Cephus’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young celebrity has won the hearts of fans around the world with her sassiness.

holidays.title: Nikola Tesla’s Birthday
holidays.description: This exceptionally brilliant engineer paved the way for modern technology with his inventions.

holidays.title: Perrie Edwards’s Birthday
holidays.description: The talented singer and fashionista has won millions of fans worldwide with her music.

holidays.title: Ronnie James Dio’s Birthday
holidays.description: This singer’s career of almost 50 years is still inspiring metal lovers around the world.
